passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(4) > section > div > div > div > form > div:nth-child(3) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > footer:nth-child(6) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > footer:nth-child(6) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h5:nth-child(1)
